name: Philia Regis
desc:
1 Dragon Fusion Monster + 1 Level 7 or higher monster
You can only use ① and ② effects of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls or in their GY; banish it, then, if you banished a card from the field, return 1 Dragon monster you control to the hand.
②：At the start of your opponent's Battle Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can return 1 Dragon monster you control to the hand/Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon this card.

name: NT8000-SIRIUS
desc:
You can only use ② and ③ effects of this card's name once per turn.
①：This linked card cannot be destroyed by battle.
②：During a turn a Link Monster activated an effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card on your field and 1 face-up card on your opponent's field; destroy those 2 cards.
③：If this card is sent to the GY, except from the field and you control a DARK Link Monster: You can Special Summon this card, but if it leaves the field, it is banished.

name: Pesanta the Troubadour Deity
desc:
A grotesque being that manifests as a response to pious prayers. 
It's said that it recites poems containing prophecies for the future, but the contents of said poems are so profound and mysterious that they're beyond understanding.

name: Dragon's Mind
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated and you control a monster with 2500 original ATK or DEF: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can pay 2500 LP; Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Argostars – Fierce Parthe
desc:
You can only use ① and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：(Quick Effect): You can reveal this card in your hand; return 1 face-up "Argostars" Continuous Trap you control to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card.
②：Gains 700 ATK/DEF for every other "Argostars" monster you control with different names.
③：You can banish this card; Set 1 Continuous Trap from your hand. It can be activated this turn.

name: Argostars – Giant Hunting
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：Add 1 "Argostars" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, if you control a Continuous Trap in the Monster Zone and/or a Continuous Trap with an effect that Special Summons itself as a monster in the Spell & Trap Zone, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Warrior monster.
②：During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 2 cards on the field, including an "Argostars" Continuous Trap you control; return them to the hand.

name: Dragon Master Lord
desc:
2 Level 12 monsters
①：This Xyz Summoned card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects, also your opponent cannot target it with card effects.
②：If this cards attacks a Defense Position monster while you have 25 or more cards in your GY, inflict double piercing battle damage.
③：Once per turn, if your opponent has 25 or more cards in their GY: You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck, Extra Deck, or GY.

name: Regulus the Fairy Beast
desc:
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell/Trap that mentions "Ancient Fairy Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.
②：During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT Beast, Plant, or Fairy monster from your hand in Defense Position.
③：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Field Spell in your GY; place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card.

name: Spore the Fairy Cell
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can increase its Level by up to the number of monsters you control.
②：If this card is in your GY and you control "Ancient Fairy Dragon" or a LIGHT Beast, Plant, or Fairy monster: You can Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monsters.

name: Kuribon the Fairy Spirit
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control "Ancient Fairy Dragon" or a LIGHT Beast, Plant, or Fairy monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, if you do, it is treated as a Tuner.
②：If another monster(s) you control that is "Ancient Fairy Dragon" or mentions it would be destroyed by card effect, you can return this card to the hand instead.

name: Cyber Jormungandr
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If your opponent controls a monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then take 1 "Cyber Dragon" from your Deck, and either Special Summon it or equip it to this card, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters.
②：You can return 1 "Cyber Dragon" you control to the hand; add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck or GY to your hand.

name: Cyberdark Wurm
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per Duel.
①：This card's name becomes "Cyber Dragon" while on the field or in the GY.
②：If this card is in your hand or GY and you have another Machine "Cyber" monster on your field or in your GY: You can send 1 "Cyber Dragon" monster from your hand or Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card, then you can add 1 "Cyber" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand.

name: The World of Spirits
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn. 
You can only activate the ② and ③ effect of this card's name while you control a Level 7 or higher LIGHT Dragon Synchro Monster.
①：When this card resolves, you can add 1 monster that mentions "Ancient Fairy Dragon" from your Deck to your hand.
②：Each time a monster(s) is Special Summoned in Attack Position: Change it to Defense Position.
③：Once per turn, during the End Phase: Destroy all the turn player's Attack Position monsters.

name: Eternal Sunshine
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name a number of times per turn up to the number of cards you control that are "Ancient Fairy Dragon" or monsters that mention it.
①：Monsters you control gain 500 DEF for each "Ancient Fairy Dragon" and each monster that mentions it you control.
②：Once per Chain: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; until the end of this turn, its current ATK/DEF become halved, also its effects are negated.

name: Live☆Twin Lil-la Sweet
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：When your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your "Live☆Twin" card or effect (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; negate that opponent's effect.
②：If this card is in your GY and you control a "Ki-sikil" monster: You can Special Summon this card, but you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck while you control this monster Summoned this way, except Fiend monsters.

name: Angelcaido of the Golden Land
desc:
"Eldlich the Golden Lord" + 1 Zombie monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing 1 LIGHT Zombie monster while you have "Eldlich the Golden Lord" on your field or in your GY, and only once per turn. 
You can only use effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Eldlich" monster from your Deck, Extra Deck, or GY.

name: Evil★Twin Ki-sikil Deal
desc:
1 "Ki-sikil" monster
You can only Link Summon "Evil★Twin Ki-sikil Deal" once per turn. You can only use effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：You can send 1 "Lil-la" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the GY; apply this effect for the rest of this turn.
● Each time your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your "Ki-sikil" or "Lil-la" monster's effect, draw 1 card.

name: Eldlixir of the Exalted Golden Land
desc:
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Pay 800 LP, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Zombie/LIGHT/Level 10/ATK 1500/DEF 2800) (it is also still a Trap), then, if you control "Eldlich the Golden Lord", you can return 1 monster on the field to the hand.
● Set 1 of your banished "Golden Land" or "Eldlixir" Spells/Traps.

name: Mitsurugi no Mikoto, Kusanagi
desc:
You can only use each effect of "Mitsurugi no Mikoto, Kusanagi" once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, or if this card is Tributed: You can target 1 "Mitsurugi" card in your GY or banishment, except "Mitsurugi no Mikoto, Kusanagi"; add it to the hand.
②：If another Reptile monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can Tribute this card instead.

name: Mitsurugi no Mikoto, Saji
desc:
You can only use each effect of "Mitsurugi no Mikoto, Saji" once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, or if this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Mitsurugi" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. 
②：If another Reptile monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can Tribute this card instead.

name: Ame no Murakumo no Mitsurugi
desc:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Mitsurugi Ritual". 
You can only use each effect of "Ame no Murakumo no Mitsurugi" once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy all monsters your opponent controls. 
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; your opponent can discard 1 card, or that effect is negated. 
③：If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Mitsurugi" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Ame no Murakumo no Mitsurugi", then you can Special Summon this card.

name: Futsu no Mitama no Mitsurugi
desc:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Mitsurugi Ritual". 
You can only activate ① effect of "Futsu no Mitama no Mitsurugi" once per Chain. 
You can only use ② effect of "Futsu no Mitama no Mitsurugi" once per turn.
①：If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 Reptile monster in your GY, except "Futsu no Mitama no Mitsurugi"; Special Summon it. 
②：If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Mitsurugi" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Futsu no Mitama no Mitsurugi", then you can Special Summon this card.

name: Mitsurugi Prayers
desc:
When you activate this card, you can also Tribute 1 Reptile monster in your hand or field; apply 1 of these effects, or if you Tributed a monster at activation, you can apply both effects in sequence.
• Add 1 "Mitsurugi" monster from your Deck to your hand.
• Take 800 damage, then you can Special Summon 1 "Mitsurugi" monster from your hand or GY, but it cannot attack directly.
You can only activate 1 "Mitsurugi Prayers" per turn.

name: Mitsurugi Ritual
Mitsurugi Great Purification
desc:
You can only use 1 "Mitsurugi Great Purification" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
①：When your opponent activates a card or effect: Tribute 1 Level 5 or higher Reptile monster; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card. 
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Reptile monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, Tribute 1 other monster you control.

name: Heraldic Beast Gryphon
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 "Heraldic Beast" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Heraldic Beast Gryphon"; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except by Xyz Summon using only monsters with "Heraldic Beast" and/or "Number" in their original names as material.
②：This card can be treated as 2 materials for the Xyz Summon of a "Number" Xyz Monster that requires 3 or more materials.

name: Heraldic Beast Stat Whale
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 card; add 2 "Heraldry" Spells/Traps from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 2 "Heraldic Beast" monsters with the same name in your GY; Special Summon them in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except by Xyz Summon using only monsters with "Heraldic Beast" and/or "Number" in their original names as material.

name: Number 69: Heraldry Crest – Shatter Stream
desc:
4 Level 4 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using 1 monster you control whose original name is "Number 69: Heraldry Crest" as material. 
(Transfer its materials to this card.) You can only use effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：When a monster effect is activated on your opponent's field, or an opponent's monster declares an attack (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Number 69: Heraldry Crest – Dark Matter Demolition" from your Extra Deck, by using this card you control as material, then destroy that opponent's monster. 
(This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.)

name: Number 69: Heraldry Crest – Dark Matter Demolition
desc:
5 Level 4 monsters
①：Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
②：Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its name is treated as "Unknown".
③：When a monster effect activated by your opponent resolves, if that monster's name is "Unknown", negate that activated effect.

name: Heraldry Flash
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：Target any number of face-up monsters your opponent controls; their names are treated as "Unknown".
②：During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY and you control a Psychic Xyz Monster: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

name: Spector, Dragon Ruler of Rays
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：You can discard this card and 1 other LIGHT or Dragon monster; add 2 "Dragon Ruler" monsters from your Deck to your hand, except "Spector, Dragon Ruler of Rays".
②：You can banish this card and 1 other LIGHT or Dragon monster from your GY, then target 1 "Chasmatis, Dragon Ruler of Auroras" in your GY; Special Summon it.

name: Nebulous, Dragon Ruler of Shadows
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：You can discard this card and 1 other DARK or Dragon monster, then target 2 of your banished "Dragon Ruler" monsters with different Attributes, except "Nebulous, Dragon Ruler of Shadows"; Special Summon them, but they cannot attack this turn.
②：You can banish this card and 1 other DARK or Dragon monster from your GY, then target 1 "Eclepsis, Dragon Ruler of Woes" in your GY; Special Summon it.

name: Chasmatis, Dragon Ruler of Auroras
desc:
2 Level 7 Dragon monsters
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：(Quick Effect): You can send 1 Level 7 "Dragon Ruler" monster from your Deck to the GY and detach 1 material from this card; this effect becomes that sent monster's effect that activates by discarding itself.
②：If this card is destroyed by battle, or this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 "Dragon Ruler" from your GY or banishment.

name: Eclipses, Dragon Ruler of Woes
desc:
2 Level 7 Dragon monsters
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Dragon Ruler" in your GY or banishment; Special Summon 1 Level/Rank 7 "Dragon Ruler" monster mentioned on it from your Deck or banishment, then shuffle that target into the Deck.
②：When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card.

name: Disaster, Dragon Ruler of Paranormalities
desc:
2 Rank 7 monsters
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target up to 4 Level 7 "Dragon Ruler" monsters in your GY and/or banishment; attach them to this card as material, then you can banish all monsters your opponent controls and in their GY with the same Attributes as the monsters attached to this card.
②：If this card has LIGHT, DARK, EARTH, WATER, FIRE, and WIND "Dragon Ruler" monsters as material, it gains 4600 ATK/DEF, also it is unaffected by other cards' effects.

name: Dragocalamity
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：Special Summon 1 "Dragon Ruler" monster from your hand, GY, or banishment, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Xyz Summon 1 "Dragon Ruler" monster using only "Dragon Ruler" monsters you control as material.
②：During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target any number of your banished "Dragon Ruler" monsters with different Attributes; return them to the GY.

name: Moissa Wight
desc:
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：This card's name becomes "Skull Servant" while in the GY.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Skull Servant" or 1 card that mentions it from your Deck to your hand, except "Moissa Wight", also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters.
③：During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

name: Wight Master
desc:
①：If your "King of the Skull Servants" attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
②：Once per turn: You can target 1 "Skull Servant" or "King of the Skull Servants" in your GY; send 1 "Skull Servant" or 1 monster that mentions it from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon that target, but you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters.

name: Dragonmaid Stern
desc:
You can only use this card name's ① and ③ effects once per turn each.
①：You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 "Dragonmaid" monster from your GY or banishment, except "Dragonmaid Stern"
②：Dragon Fusion Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
③：At the end of the Battle Phase: You can return this card to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Dragonmaid" monster from your hand.

name: Dragonmaid Latys
desc:
2 "Dragonmaid" monsters with the same Attribute but different Levels
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing 1 each of the above cards from your field and GY. 
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Dragonmaid" monster from your Deck.
②：During the Standby Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Dragon Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling its materials from your field and/or banishment into the Deck.

name: Endymion, the Crescent of Magistus
desc:
2 monsters, including a Level 4 Spellcaster monster
You can only ① or ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Magistus" monster you control; equip 1 Spellcaster monster from your GY or banishment to it.
②：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Spellcaster Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone treated as an Equip Spell; return it to the hand.

name: Ancient Fairy Life Dragon
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use ① effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can draw 1 card, or, if "The World of Spirits" is on the field, add 1 LIGHT Beast, Plant, Fairy monster or 1 "Eternal Sunshine" from your Deck to your hand instead.
②：Your "Ancient Fairy Dragon" and monsters that mention it can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation.

name: Two-for-One Repair Job
desc:
You can only use 1 of the ① and ② effect of this card's name per turn, and only once that turn.
①：Banish 1 DARK Machine monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand, Deck, or GY that mentions "Engine Token".
②：If a face-up DARK Machine monster(s) you control is sent to the GY while this card is in your GY, except by battle: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 "Engine Token" (Machine/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 200/DEF 200) in Attack Position.

name: Scrap Garage
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If a face-up Machine monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or effect: Target up to 3 DARK Machine monsters in your GY; Special Summon them, but change their ATK/DEF to 0.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Machine monster you control; destroy it.

name: Ice Doll
desc:
You can only use this card name's ①, ②, and ③ effects once per turn each.
You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate any of this card name's effects, except WATER monsters.
①：You can discard 1 other WATER monster; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 WATER Spellcaster monster from your Deck to your hand.
③：If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Ice Doll Mirror" from your Deck to your hand.

name: Twin Pillars of Ice
desc:
You can only use this card name's ① and ② effects once per turn each.
①：Special Summon 2 "Ice Pillar Tokens" (Aqua/WATER/Level 4/ATK 900/DEF 1200) in Defense Position. For the rest of the turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 WATER monster.

name: Ice Doll Mirror
desc:
You can only use this card name's ① and (2)st effects once per turn each.
①：Send 1 WATER monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name as a WATER monster you control from your hand or Deck. For the rest of the turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except WATER monsters.
②：You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Ice Doll" from your Deck or GY to your hand.

name: Bat, the Forest Ninja
desc:
You can only Special Summon with the way in this card name's ① effect once per turn. 
You can only use this card name's ② effect once per turn.
①：You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) if there is a face-up card in a Field Zone.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned and "Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey's Dawn" is on your field or in your GY: You can add 1 LIGHT Beast monster from your Deck to your hand.

name: Wonko, Noble Knight of the Forest
desc:
You can only use this card name's ① effect once per turn.
①：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey's Dawn" from your Deck to your hand. If "Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey's Dawn" is on your field or in your GY, you can draw 1 card instead.
②：Your opponent's monsters can only select this card as an attack target if there is a card in a Field Zone.
③：When this card is destroyed by battle: You can have the monster that destroyed it lose 500 ATK.

name: Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey’s Dawn
desc:
You can only use this card name's ② effect once per turn.
①：Halve all battle damage each player takes.
②：If you control a LIGHT Beast monster or a Level 7 or 8 Dragon Synchro Monster: You can draw 1 card.
③：Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can send this card from the Field Zone to the GY; place 1 Field Spell from your hand or Deck face-up in your Field Zone, except "Fairy Tale Prologue: Journey's Dawn".

name: D/D Extra Surveyor
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 4
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If a face-up Monster Card(s) your opponent controls is destroyed by battle or effect: You can target 1 "D/D/D" monster you control; banish 2 cards from your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, that target can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use ① and ② monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can discard this card; add 1 face-up "D/D" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand, except "D/D Extra Surveyor".
②：If this card becomes banished: You can banish cards from the top of your opponent's Deck equal to the number of face-up Pendulum Monsters in their Extra Deck, then you can make 1 "D/D" monster you control gain 200 ATK for each card banished by this effect.

name: Zoroa, the Magistus Victorious Verethragna
desc:
1 "Magistus" monster + 1 Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls or in your GY; equip that Effect Monster to this card.
②：When a monster effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can send 1 face-up "Magistus" Monster Card you control to the GY; negate that effect, then you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

name: Magia Magic – Thor Hammer
desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Magistus" and "Endymion" card.)
①：Send 1 other face-up "Magistus" card you control to the GY, OR remove 2 Spell Counters from your field, to activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of this card's name once per turn).
● Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your hand, face-up Extra Deck, or GY.
● Banish 1 other card on the field.

name: Number S37: Spider Shark
desc:
3 Level 5 WATER monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Number 37: Spider Shark" you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.)
①：Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish that monster until your opponent's next Standby Phase, and if you do and if your opponent controls a monster, all monsters they control lose 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.
②：During the End Phase of a turn that this Xyz Summoned card was destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card.

name: Number S38: Titanic Galaxy
desc:
3 Level 9 LIGHT monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Number 38: Titanic Galaxy" you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.)
①：Gains 200 ATK for each material it has.
②：Once per turn: You can target up to 2 Spell/Traps your opponent controls (the targeted cards cannot activate their effects in response to this activation); attach them this card as material.
③：You can detach 1 material from this card; for the rest of this turn, this card's original ATK become 1500 and it can attack directly.

name: Revelation of Hope
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Send 1 face-up Level 8 Dragon monster from your field to the GY; Special Summon 1 Rank 8 Dragon Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck (this is treated as an Xyz Summon).

name: Galaxy Journey
desc:
You can only use this card name's ① and ② effects once per turn each.
①：Special Summon 1 of your banished LIGHT or DARK monster.
②：If a face-up Xyz Monster(s) you control becomes banished and this card is in your GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it.

name: Verre Magic – Lacrima of Light
desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Magistus" and "Witchcrafter" card.)
①：Activate 1 of these effects (but you can only use each effect of this card's name once per turn).
● If you control a "Magistus" or "Witchcrafter" monster: Send 1 Spellcaster monster or 1 Spell from your Deck to the GY.
● When your opponent activates a card or effect: Special Summon 1 "Magistus" or "Witchcrafter" monster from your hand or Deck.

name: Motor Kaiser
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can reveal this card in your hand; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 DARK Machine monster.
②：You can target 1 monster you control; destroy it, then you can Special Summon 1 "Engine Token" (Machine/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 200/DEF 200) in Attack Position.

name: D/D Count Surveyor
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
①：Once per turn, if you Pendulum Summon a "D/D/D" monster(s): You can target 3 monsters your opponent controls with the same Type or Attribute as each other; Tribute 2 of those face-up monsters, and if you do, the other gains ATK/DEF equal to the total ATK/DEF the Tributed monsters had on the field.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use ① and ② monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can discard 1 other "D/D" monster; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "D/D" monster with 0 ATK or DEF from your Deck to your hand.

name: D/D Scale Surveyor
desc:
Pendulum Scale = 9
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can only use Pendulum Effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：During the Standby Phase: You can target up to 2 cards in the Pendulum Zone; their Pendulum Scales become 0 until the end of this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ monster effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a "D/D" Pendulum Monster Card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can make its Level become 4.
③：If this card is sent to the GY or added to the Extra Deck face-up: You can target 1 "D/D" Pendulum Monster Card you control; return it to the hand.

name: Crowley, the Gifted of Magistus
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can Special Summon it.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Magistus" or "Invoked" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material.
③：If this face-up card is used as Fusion Material, it can be treated as "Aleister the Invoker".

name: Festiballoon
desc:
You can only use ③ effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle.
②：Each time a monster declares an attack, this card gains 1000 ATK.
③：During your Main Phase: You can make this card lose exactly 5000 ATK, and if you do, destroy all other cards on the field.

name: Secret Stash Slipshod Squirrel
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target up to 3 Spells/Traps in your GY; banish them, and if you do, shuffle them into the Deck during the End Phase of the next turn.
②：During your Standby Phase: You can target 1 of your banished Spells/Traps; Set it.

name: Bazoo the Soul Eater Beast
desc:
3 Level 4 monsters
①：Any Xyz Material detached is banished.
②：Once per Chain, if a Monster Card(s) is sent to the GY: You can detach 1 material from this card.
③：If the last material(s) is detached from this card: You can target up 3 cards in the GY(s); attach them to this card as material.

name: Shateki
desc:
①：You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls that has a Level; roll a six-sided die and apply this effect based on the result.
● Higher than that monster's Level: Destroy that target, then you can add 1 monster with the same original Level from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot activate the ① effect of "Shateki" for the rest of this turn.
● Equal to or lower than that monster's Level: Reduce that target's Level by 1.

name: Shadow Trouble
desc:
①：Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; apply this effect based on the number of cards with that name in your opponent's GY.
● 1: Destroy it.
● 2: Banish it.
● 3+: Banish it, also all cards with that name, from your opponent's field and GY face-down.

name: Wizard @Ignister
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If you control a Cyberse monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can target 1 DARK Cyberse monster in your GY; Special Summon both this card from your hand and that monster in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Cyberse monsters.
②：You can banish this card from your field or GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; change its battle position.

name: Backup @Ignister
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If you control a Cyberse monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 DARK Cyberse monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Backup @Ignister", then discard 1 card.

name: Kurikulink @Ignister
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：(Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 "@Ignister" monster; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field.
②：When a card or effect is activated that targets a Cyberse monster(s) you control and you control a Cyberse monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; negate that effect.

name: Firewall Saber Dragon
desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 Cyberse monster in your GY or banishment; add it to your hand.
②：You can target 1 other Cyberse monster you control that has a Level; this card's Level becomes that monster's.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can add 1 "A.I." Spell from your Deck to your hand.

name: Code Igniter
desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 Cyberse Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand.
②：You can detach 1 material from this card; Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand and/or field whose total Levels equal or exceed its Level.
③：If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can add 1 "A.I." Trap from your Deck to your hand.

name: Accode Talker @Ignister
desc:
3+ Effect Monsters
You can only use ② effect of this card's name once per turn.
①：If this card is Link Summoned: You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon other monsters for the rest of this turn, also Special Summon as many Cyberse monsters with 2300 ATK from your GY as possible to your zones this card points to, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK for each.
②：When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Link Monster this card points to; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card.

name: TA.I.es
desc:
You can only activate 1 card with this card's name per turn.
①：Reveal 1 Cyberse monster in your hand; apply this effect based on its Attribute, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, except Cyberse monsters.
● DARK: Special Summon the revealed monster, and if you do, add 1 non-DARK Level 4 or lower Cyberse monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Non-DARK: Shuffle the revealed monster into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 "@Ignister" monster with a different Attribute from your Deck to your hand.

name: PA.I.rtners
desc:
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：Target face-up cards your opponent controls equal to the number of Cyberse monsters you control with 2300 original ATK; negate their effects until the end of this turn.
②：You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished Cyberse monsters; Special Summon it.

name: Noh-P.U.N.K. Rising Scale
desc:
You can only use ①, ②, and ③ effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can banish 1 other "P.U.N.K." card from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand.
②：If this card is Special Summoned: You can pay 600 LP; take 1 "P.U.N.K." monster from your Deck or GY, except a Level 8 monster, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it.
③：When a monster your opponent controls with 2500 or more ATK activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can change it to face-down Defense Position.

name: P.U.N.K. JAM FEVER!
desc:
2 Level 8 monsters
Once per turn, you can Xyz Summon "P.U.N.K. JAM FEVER!" by using 1 "P.U.N.K." Fusion or Synchro Monster you control as material. 
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can pay 600 LP and detach 1 material from this card; draw 1 card.
②：When another monster's effect is activated and you have a Level 3 Psychic monster in your GY (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster.

name: Steam Knight - BULLauncher
desc: "BULLauncher" is a support machine specializing in bombardment and daytime combat that not only has the constantly refined "Coc-OS" and "BFS Armor", but it also has 3 "Foil-Packer" installed within it under orders of "Madera" after repeated trial and error. By installing a "Beef-Rifle" or other armaments, it can be used as medium and long range support for the "Steam Knights" and their operations. Also, "BULLauncher" can be combined with "WINGear" which specializes in high-speed aerial combat and "BOARms", which specializes in melee and assault combat, to cause the high calorie "Steam Jushin - BW" to descend upon this world.

name: Galatea-i, the Orcust Automaton
desc:
1 "Orcust" or "World Legacy" monster
You can only Link Summon "Galatea-i, the Orcust Automaton(s)" once per turn. Cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon. 
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; add 1 "World Legacy" monster or "Orcustrated Babel" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
②：If this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 other "Orcust" card from your GY; Special Summon this card.

name: Enlilgirsu, the Orcust Mekk-Knight
desc:
2+ monsters, including an "Orcust" Link Monster
You can only use ① and ② effect of this card's name each once per turn.
①：You can target 1 of your banished "Orcust" or "World Legacy" cards; add it to your hand, then you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck to take control of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
②：If this card is in your GY because it was sent there from the Extra Monster Zone this turn: You can banish it; send 1 card on the field to the GY.
